Index Show pagesource Old revisions Login Digg this! Del.Icio.Us Google bookmark Irwin King, MISC Lab "...the truth shall set you free.", Caltech's Motto Professor, B.Sc. (Caltech), M.Sc., Ph.D. (USC) Vice-Chair of ACM SIGWEB and ACM WebConf Steering Committee Director, Centre for eLearning Innovation and Technology (ELITE) Principal Investigator, The Knowledge and Education Exchange Platform (KEEP) Project Principal Investigator, VeriGuide Project Former Associate Dean (Education), Engineering Faculty Former President of International Neural Network Society, (INNS) FIEEE (CIS), SMACM, APNNA (VP, BoG), FHKIE, IrwinKing.com Department of Computer Science and Engineering (Room 908) The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shatin, NT, Hong Kong Phone: +(852) 3943 8398; Fax: +(852) 2603 5024 Email: king [ at ] cse [ dot ] cuhk [ dot ] edu [ dot ] hk See me in DBLP, Google Scholar, ResearchGate Research Interests Machine learning, social computing, neural networks, web intelligence, data mining, information retrieval, plagiarism detection, multimedia information processing Trustworthy AI, Federated learning, and related topics in security and privacy, robustness, fairness, explainability, etc. Natural language processing, LLM, Q&A, key phrase summarization, sentiment analysis, etc. Graph neural networks, graph embedding, knowledge graph, etc. AI and graph applications in medicine, e.g., protein folding, data mining of health records, medical knowledge graphs, etc.*/ Multiple Positions Available (September 2024) Looking for a qualified Postdoctoral candidate interested in trustworthy AI, federated learning, machine learning, NLP, social computing, GNN, etc. to start immediately. Looking for qualified PhD candidates interested in trustworthy AI, machine learning, federated learning, graph neural networks, NLP, social computing, AI, data mining, or related fields to start in August 2025. Looking for experienced programmers/software engineers/web developers to work in front-end and back-end web development projects involving AI, education, and related projects. Please see this link for more information on various engineering positions. Good self-financed candidates are also given priority. For Interested PhD Candidates For interested candidates, please send your CV, a publication list, and a brief (1-2 page) statement of your research interests to Prof. Irwin King, email. Postgraduate Studentship. I am always looking for excellent postgraduate students who are energetic, creative, analytical, hard-working, independent, and well-grounded in mathematics to join our group to work on machine learning and social computing-related projects. Send an email with your interests and resume. more Research Interests>> Recent Accepted Publications Yankai Chen, Yaming Yang, Yujing Wang, Jing Bai, Xiangchen Song, and Irwin King. Attentive Knowledge-aware Graph Convolutional Networks with Collaborative Guidance for Personalized Recommendation, ICDE 2022, May 9-12, 2022, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia Zixing Song and Irwin King.
